name: No Do Overs
description:
You know how this works, the Demon King has kidnapped the princess and it's my job to save her.

Warning - There's big red pixels (blood) in this game so it may not be safe for little ones

Play as the legendary Shotgun Knight as you fight to save the princess from the Demon King. You will die...a lot and when you die, you are dead. But just because you died in this universe doesn't mean you didn't succeed in another. Just keep trying and eventually, with a bit of luck, some version of you will succeed.

Controls

Z - Jump

Space - Shoot

Arrows - move

Down+Shoot - Shotgun Jump

Credits

Code/Bad art - Zeroed

Good Art - 0x72 - https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Background music - Cessation of Suffering -  https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/951706
